subtitle: This sponge and apple pudding is an old family favourite.

method.text: Place the apples and dates in the base of a 900 ml ovenproof dish. Sprinkle over the Demerara sugar and lemon rind.
Cream the fat and caster sugar together until pale and fluffy. Add the egg a little at a time, beating well after each addition.
Fold in the flour with enough milk to give a smooth dropping consistency. Spread the mixture over the apples.
Sprinkle the top with the slivered Brazils. Bake for 40-45 min until the apples are tender and the sponge mixture golden brown.

title: Eve's pudding
